core_features.description: Create and manage products, product category, variants, SKU, costing methods

pages.name: Product Management Page
details: Table of all products with search & filters (category, SKU, active/inactive)
Create/Edit Product Form: Product name, category, SKU, description, costing method, unit of measure, re-order level, variants
Actions: Create, Edit, Deactivate

core_features.description: Real-time stock levels. Incoming, outgoing, and internal stock moves. Stock valuation and costing. Low stock notification, aging report

pages.name: Stock Management Page
details: Table of stock levels grouped by product & warehouse: current qty, reserved qty, available qty, stock value
Form Stock Adjustment: Product, warehouse, qty in/out, reason code
Incoming deliveries (from purchase orders)
Outgoing deliveries (from sales orders)
Internal Transfer: From location, To location, product, qty

core_features.description: Incoming shipments, outgoing shipments (delivery), internal transfer

pages.name: Operations/Flows Page
details: Incoming Shipments: Track and confirm receipts, link to purchase orders
Outgoing Shipments: Link with sales delivery, confirm and assign shipments
Internal Transfers: Process and record inventory movement within company locations

core_features.description: Manage list of warehouses and locations. Storage location. Removal strategies (FIFO, LIFO, FEFO), stock transfers

pages.name: Warehouse Management Page
details: Table of warehouses: Name, code, location, capacity
Create/Edit Warehouse: Name, address, manager, capacity, removal strategy
Table of storage locations: rack/bin/aisle
Create/Edit Location: Location code, description, capacity, parent warehouse, removal strategy

core_features.description: Integrate incoming/outgoing shipments with Sales and Purchasing Modules

pages.name: Sales Integration Page
details: Automatically update stock based on sales orders and purchase orders
Sync product availability with sales module
Integration with order fulfillment

core_features.description: Operations Report, Returned Product, Stock per-Warehouse, Warehouse Capacity Report, Inventory Valuation, Stock In/Out Report

pages.name: Inventory Dashboard
details: Warehouse Capacity Report: Utilization of each warehouse
Detailed log of stock movement by date/product
Inventory Valuation Report: Value of stock per warehouse
Product Performance Report: Fast-moving vs slow-moving, returns, shrinkage

core_features.description: Alternate products, reserve stock, automatic deduction upon BOM and WO execution

pages.name: Manufacturing Integration Page
details: Reserve stock for manufacturing orders
Deduct inventory when Bill of Materials (BOM) and work orders (WO) are executed
Support alternate products for flexible manufacturing flows
